article.title: The first detection of helium in an exoplanet’s atmosphere
article.text: In a new study published May 2 in the journal Nature, an international team of researchers used a novel technique to probe the atmosphere of the exoplanet WASP-107b, resulting in the first-ever detection of helium in the air of an alien world.
